title: guru malaraDi tuNaiyE engaL sadguru
sahitya:
guru malaraDi tuNaiyE engaL sadguru mahimai tanakku vErEdu iNaiyE


anupallavi

  oru manaduDan enrum urudiyAi vazhipaDa dharma neriyil nammai tavarAdu kUTTi shollum


caraNam 1    kaNNirundum kuruDarAik-kalangit-tirivOrkku kadiroLi ena vazhi kATTiDum pAdam 
puNNiya shIlargaL pOTriDum pAdam pUraNa jnAna neri pughaTTiDum pAdam
    caraNam 2    kaliyinil nammaik-kAttiDum pAdam kaLangamillA manadil kuDi pughum pAdam 
valiya vandu namakku vazhi kATTiDum pAdam vaNangum gurudAsan tudittiDum pAdam
